metadata.title: CVE-2024-26824 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: crypto:algif_hash - Remove bogus SGL free on zero-length error path When azero-length message is hashed by algif_hash, and an error is triggered, ittries to free an SG list that was never allocated in the first place. Fixthis by not freeing the SG list on the zero-length error path.
